column4: i use the dload helper on firefox but im wantin to burn to a vcd
when you say vcd, do you mean file extension 'vcd' or just a file that you can play on a dvd player?
....if it's just video format ...you can try Download Helper extension for the FireFox browser
sorry, I haven't used any software yet for converting say 'avi' files to dvd, or video files.
